Gayatri Mantra (Simple).transliteration: Om Bhur Bhuvaḥ Svaḥ Tat Savitur Vareṇyaṁ.
Gayatri Mantra (Simple).english: A short version of Gayatri Mantra for kids.

Saraswati Vandana (Kids).english: Salutations to Goddess Saraswati, the giver of wisdom.

Respect Parents Shloka.sanskrit: मातृ देवो भव। पितृ देवो भव।
Respect Parents Shloka.transliteration: Mātṛ Devo Bhava, Pitṛ Devo Bhava.
Respect Parents Shloka.english: Treat your mother and father as divine.

Short Sanskrit Prayer.sanskrit:
गुरुर्ब्रह्मा गुरुर्विष्णुः गुरुर्देवो महेश्वरः।
गुरुः साक्षात् परं ब्रह्म तस्मै श्रीगुरवे नमः॥
Short Sanskrit Prayer.transliteration:
Gurur Brahmā Gurur Viṣhṇuḥ Gurur Devo Maheśvaraḥ,
Guruḥ Sākṣāt Paraṁ Brahma Tasmai Śrī Gurave Namah.
Short Sanskrit Prayer.english: The Guru is Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva — the Supreme. Salutations to that revered Guru.
